attributes.action: Publish daily statistics on the number of people vaccinated against COVID-19
attributes.additional_details: Including daily statistics on the number of people vaccinated would serve two important purposes. It would boost morale and give people hope amid all the depressing statistics. It will also ensure that the government can be more easily held to account if they fail to deliver on their vaccination targets.
attributes.background: The government's dashboard with the daily coronavirus statistics on cases, tests carried out, hospital admissions, and deaths should also include a daily statistic showing the number of people vaccinated.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/564526
